content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.T_STInstruction') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.T_STInstruction
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.T_STInstruction (
[tms_instruction_id] bigint,
[tms_instruction_bookingid] bigint,
[tms_instruction_addressid] bigint,
[tms_instruction_instrtype] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_instruction_onroute] int,
[tms_instruction_onrouteid] bigint,
[tms_instruction_sort] int,
[tms_instruction_onroutestatus] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_instruction_note] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_instruction_citybranchid] bigint,
[tms_instruction_citybranchname] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_instruction_insdate] datetime2(7),
[tms_instruction_moddate] datetime2(7),
[tms_instruction_insby] bigint,
[tms_instruction_bookingpickupdeliverydate] datetime2(7),
[orv_lhdelivery_id] bigint,
[orv_lhdelivery_did] bigint,
[orv_lhdelivery_lat] float,
[orv_lhdelivery_lng] float,
[orv_lhdelivery_actualeta] datetime2(7),
[orv_lhdelivery_eta] datetime2(7),
[orv_lhdelivery_tsgeofenceenter] datetime2(7),
[orv_lhdelivery_tsdocuments] datetime2(7),
[orv_lhdelivery_customerref1] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_lhdelivery_customerref2] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_lhdelivery_trailersize] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_lhdelivery_cargoweight] float,
[orv_lhdelivery_cubicvolume] float,
[orv_lhdelivery_geocodingstatus] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_lhdelivery_status] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_lhdelivery_optimizedorder] int,
[orv_lhdelivery_triporder] int,
[orv_lhdelivery_sequence] int,
[orv_lhdelivery_bookingid] bigint,
[orv_lhdelivery_grv] int,
[orv_lhdelivery_chepslip] int,
[orv_lhdelivery_type] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_lhdelivery_insdate] datetime2(7),
[orv_lhdelivery_isdirect] int,
[orv_lhdelivery_notes] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_lhdelivery_contactperson] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_lhdelivery_contactnumber] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_lhdelivery_trailerfleetcode] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_lhdelivery_primarycustomerid] bigint,
[orv_lhdelivery_pcustomername] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_lhdelivery_pcustomeraccountnumber] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_lhdelivery_pcustomerrevenuecode] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_lhdelivery_secondarycustomerid] bigint,
[orv_lhdelivery_scustomername] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_lhdelivery_scustomeraccountnumber] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_lhdelivery_scustomerrevenuecode] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_lhdelivery_actiondate] datetime2(7),
[orv_lhdelivery_tsgeofenceexit] datetime2(7),
[orv_lhdelivery_pctmsid] bigint,
[orv_lhdelivery_sctmsid] bigint,
[orv_lhdelivery_customorder] int,
[orv_lhdelivery_skipdate] datetime2(7),
[orv_lhdelivery_skipreason] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_lhdelivery_outofgeofencereason] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_lhdelivery_tsarrivedcustomer] datetime2(7),
[orv_lhdelivery_tsdroppedoff] datetime2(7),
[orv_lhdelivery_tsstartoffloading] datetime2(7),
[orv_lhdelivery_tsstartloading] datetime2(7),
[orv_lhdelivery_tsloaded] datetime2(7),
[orv_lhdelivery_tsfinishedoffloading] datetime2(7),
[orv_lhdelivery_tsdocumnetshanddovedriver] datetime2(7),
[orv_lhdelivery_tsleavingcustomer] datetime2(7),
[orv_lhdelivery_actionsubtype] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_lhdelivery_tsstart] datetime2(7),
[orv_lhdelivery_signame] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_lhdelivery_signcomment] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_lhdelivery_signdate] datetime2(7),
[orv_lhdelivery_tsendtate] datetime2(7),
[orv_lhdelivery_tsentergeofenceapp] datetime2(7),
[orv_lhdelivery_tsexitgeofenceapp] datetime2(7),
[orv_lhdelivery_tmsid] bigint,
[orv_lhdelivery_subtype] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_lhdelivery_needbotrailerver] int,
[orv_lhdelivery_secondtrailerfleetcode] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_lhdelivery_trailerverlat] float,
[orv_lhdelivery_trailerverlng] float,
[orv_lhdelivery_tstrailerver] bigint,
[orv_lhdelivery_podlat] float,
[orv_lhdelivery_podlng] float,
[orv_lhdelivery_skiplat] float,
[orv_lhdelivery_skiplng] float,
[orv_lhdelivery_uncanceldate] datetime2(7),
[tms_instruction_inputpickupduration] bigint,
[tms_instruction_loadingduration] bigint,
[tms_instruction_geopickupduration] bigint,
[tms_instruction_actionpickupduration] bigint,
[tms_instruction_inservice] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_instruction_driverinputservice] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_instruction_geofenceservice] nvarchar(4000),







	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Structured Data/OPS/stinstruction.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.T_STInstruction 
GO
